job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree or higher in relevant field or RHIA (Registered Health Information Administrator)

jd: From: Aakash, Ozin Technologies aakash.sharma@ozin.ai Reply to: aakash.sharma@ozin.ai Title: Sr. Health Plan Analyst Duration: 3-4 Months-Ritht to Hire Job Location: Renton, WA Hybrid Role Visa: GC and USC with Visa copy, Local candidate only Need Visa copy, DL copy and LinkedIn profile link. Required: 10-15 years health plan experience. 3 years - Health care experience in a group practice, outpatient/inpatient or health plan setting. Advanced SQL experience. Strong data mining and analytical skills to identify trends or discrepancies in data and the ability to research findings for solutions. Bachelor's degree or higher in relevant field or RHIA (Registered Health Information Administrator). Experience with SQL scripts - analysis and consolidation for more streamlined and accessible self-serve reporting for leaders within USFHP (US Family Health Plan). Preferred Qualifications: HEDIS software application. Electronic health record experience. Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau. Responsibilities: Responsible for healthcare quality-related data collection, audit processes, data analysis, and reporting to support the US Family Health Plan (USFHP) and Centers quality program and leadership.
